name: Litha Thwalela
city: City of Johannesburg, Gauteng, South Africa
position: Global Markets Operations Equity Derivatives (EQD) Confirmations officer at Standard Bank Group
about: Experienced Corporate Specialist with a demonstrated history of working in the financial services industry. Skilled in Communication, Business Intelligence, Big Data, Agile Project Management, and Statistics. Strong operations professional with a Postgraduate Diploma in Financial Markets focused in Investments and Securities from University of Johannesburg.
